summary:
magic Archer
allow your bow to shoot the fireball and icicle
descriptionHtml:
this is my first mod?
it add three type of arrow
they are called
fireball arrow
icicle arrow
spiderspit arrow
the fireball arrow allow you to shoot a fireball by using your bow and it won\\\'t loss any magic.
the icicle arrow allow you to shoot a icicle by using your bow and it won\\\'t loss any magic.
the spiderspit arrow allow you to shoot a \"spiderweb\" come of your bow.. it\'s funny...
where to get
the only way to get it is use the Console? which is ~ help \"fireball arrow\"
                                                                                 help \"icicle arrow\"
                                                                                 help \"spiderspit arrow\"
and i also change the arrow damage to a Normal Numerical.
if there is some problem of this mod please message me! thankyou =)
if you thought it was a great mod feel free to Reserved or translate it=)
finally sorry for my English!...
by:StarDust
author: StarDust
